name: Lucky Chest of Beauty Secrets Advent Calendar
about: What it is: A set of Charlotte Tilbury's world of makeup and skincare icons—discover a beauty secret in every jewel-handled drawer...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan...What Else You Need to Know: Discover a beauty secret in every jewel-handled drawer of this Lucky Chest of Beauty Secrets. The set features Charlotte Tilbury's award-winning makeup magic and glowing skincare icons to make you look and feel like a star and to make all your beauty dreams come true...This Set Contains:.- 0.41 oz/ 12 mL Beauty Light Wand in Pinkgasm (pink highlight).- 1 oz/ 30 mL Charlotte’s Magic Lip Oil.- 1 oz/ 30 mL Airbrush Flawless Setting Spray.- 0.13 oz/ 4 mL Pillow Talk Push Up Lashes Mascara in Super Black (black).- 0.02 oz/ 0.6 mL Pillow Talk Eyeliner in Pillow Talk (pink nude).- 0.02 oz/ 0.6 mL Lip Cheat Liner in Pillow Talk (pink nude).- 2 x 0.05 oz/ 1.7 mL Matte Revolutions in Pillow Talk (nude pink) and Hollywood Vixen (a classic, bright, blue-red for a hollywood star pout).- 0.08 oz/ 2.3 mL Hyaluronic Happikiss in Pillow Talk (iconic nudey-pink).- 1 oz/ 30 mL Glow Toner.- 0.27 oz/ 8 mL Magic Serum.- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Magic Cream
